meanings.sent1: The old car was fenderless, with no protective metal around the wheels.
meanings.sent2: The motorcycle looked sleek and fenderless, giving it a modern appearance.
meanings.sent3: When the car lost its fenders, it became fenderless and started feeling naked.
meanings.sent4: The fenderless bike raced down the road, feeling the wind directly against its frame.
meanings.sent5: The fenderless vehicle stood out in the parking lot, attracting attention with its unique design.

meanings.sent1: The vintage car was fenderless, exposing its wheels to the elements.
meanings.sent2: The bicycle was fenderless, making it easier to maneuver through tight spaces.
meanings.sent3: The fenderless truck splashed mud everywhere, much to the amusement of onlookers.
meanings.sent4: Her fenderless scooter zipped through traffic, feeling the thrill of the open road.
meanings.sent5: The fenderless cart rattled along the bumpy road, its lack of fenders evident in every jolt.
